name: Blessed Blood
benefits: Your deity's blessings manifest in your blood-borne power

name: Counterspell (Spontaneous)
benefits: When a foe casts a spell, you can try to use your own magic to disrupt it.

pf2t.name: Counterspell (Spontaneous)
pf2t.body:
**Requirements** You have an unexpended spell slot you could use to cast the triggering spell.
**Trigger** A creature casts a spell that you have in your repertoire.

- - -

When a foe Casts a Spell you know and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it. You expend one of your spell slots to counter the triggering creature's casting of a spell that you have in your repertoire. You lose your spell slot as if you had cast the triggering spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell.

name: Dangerous Sorcery
benefits: Your legacy grants you great destructive power.

pf2t.name: Dangerous Sorcery
pf2t.body: Your legacy grants you great destructive power. When you Cast a Spell from your spell slots, if the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, you gain a status bonus to that spell's damage equal to the spell's level.

name: Familiar
benefits: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Reach Spell
benefits: You can extend your spells' range.

name: Widen Spell
benefits: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Cantrip Expansion
benefits: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Enhanced Familiar
benefits: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Arcane Evolution
benefits: Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits.

pf2t.name: Arcane Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline that grants arcane spells

- - -

Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits. You become trained in one skill of your choice. Additionally, you keep a book of arcane spells similar to a wizard's spellbook. You add all the spells in your spell repertoire to this book for free, and you can add additional arcane spells to the book by paying the appropriate cost and using your Arcana skill, similarly to how a wizard can Learn Spells to add those spells to his spellbook.

During your daily preparations, choose any one spell from your book of arcane spells. If it isn't in your spell repertoire, add it to your spell repertoire until the next time you prepare. If it's already in your spell repertoire, add it as an additional signature spell for that day.

#### Arcane Evolution Leads To...
Greater Mental Evolution, Greater Physical Evolution

name: Bespell Weapon
benefits: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you're wielding.

name: Divine Evolution
benefits: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.

pf2t.name: Divine Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline that grants divine spells

- - -

The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast your choice of heal or harm. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if they aren't in your spell repertoire.

#### Divine Evolution Leads To...
Greater Spiritual Evolution, Greater Vital Evolution

name: Occult Evolution
benefits: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power.

pf2t.name: Occult Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline that grants occult spells

- - -

Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power. You become trained in one skill of your choice. Additionally, once per day, you can spend 1 minute to choose one mental occult spell you don't know and add it to your spell repertoire. You lose this temporary spell the next time you make your daily preparations (though you can use this ability to add it again later).

#### Occult Evolution Leads To...
Greater Mental Evolution, Greater Spiritual Evolution

name: Primal Evolution
benefits: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid.

pf2t.name: Primal Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline that grants primal spells

- - -

You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast summon animal or summon plants or fungus. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if it they aren't in your spell repertoire.

#### Primal Evolution Leads To...
Greater Physical Evolution, Greater Vital Evolution

name: Advanced Bloodline
benefits: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic.

pf2t.name: Advanced Bloodline
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline spell

- - -

You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic. You gain the advanced bloodline spell associated with your bloodline. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

name: Steady Spellcasting
benefits: You don't lose spells easily.

name: Bloodline Resistance
benefits: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic.

pf2t.name: Bloodline Resistance
pf2t.body: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against spells and magical effects.

name: Crossblooded Evolution
benefits: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells.

pf2t.name: Crossblooded Evolution
pf2t.body:
Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells. You can have one spell in your spell repertoire from a tradition other than the one that matches your bloodline. You cast that spell as a spell from your bloodline's tradition. You can swap which spell you add and from which tradition as you could any other sorcerer spell, but you can't have more than one spell from another tradition in your spell repertoire at the same time using this feat.

#### Crossblooded Evolution Leads To...
Greater Crossblooded Evolution

name: Greater Bloodline
benefits: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

pf2t.name: Greater Bloodline
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline spell

- - -

Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets. You gain the greater bloodline spell associated with your bloodline. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

name: Overwhelming Energy
benefits: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

pf2t.name: Overwhelming Energy
pf2t.body: You alter your spells to overcome resistances. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell, the spell ignores an amount of the target's resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to your level. This applies to all damage the spell deals, including persistent damage and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell, such as the wall created by wall of fire. A creature's immunities are unaffected.

name: Quickened Casting
benefits: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

name: Bloodline Focus
benefits: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

pf2t.name: Bloodline Focus
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline spell

- - -

Your focus recovers faster. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

#### Bloodline Focus Leads To...
Bloodline Wellspring

name: Magic Sense
benefits: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

name: Interweave Dispel
prerequisites: dispel magic in your spell repertoire
benefits: You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.

pf2t.name: Interweave Dispel
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** dispel magic in your spell repertoire

- - -

You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe. If your next action is to cast a single-target spell against a creature, and you either hit the foe with the spell attack roll or the foe fails its saving throw, you can cast dispel magic on the foe as a free action, expending a spell slot as normal and targeting one spell effect affecting the foe.

name: Reflect Spell
benefits: You cause a spell to fire back at its caster.

name: Effortless Concentration
benefits: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Greater Mental Evolution
benefits: Your bloodline's deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire.

pf2t.name: Greater Mental Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** Arcane Evolution or Occult Evolution

- - -

Your bloodline's deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire. Add one spell to your spell repertoire for each spell level you can cast.

name: Greater Vital Evolution
benefits: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy.

pf2t.name: Greater Vital Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** Divine Evolution or Primal Evolution

- - -

Vital power surges through you like a font of energy. Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell level; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell levels.

name: Bloodline Wellspring
benefits: Your blood's power replenishes your focus.

pf2t.name: Bloodline Wellspring
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** Bloodline Focus

- - -

Your blood's power replenishes your focus. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
benefits: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

pf2t.name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** Crossblooded Evolution

- - -

Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex. You can have up to three spells from other traditions in your spell repertoire, rather than just one. These spells must each be of a different spell level, but they don't need to be from the same tradition.

name: Bloodline Conduit
benefits: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

pf2t.name: Bloodline Conduit
pf2t.body: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells. If your next action is to Cast a Spell of 5th level or lower that has no duration, you don't expend the spell's slot when you cast it.

name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
benefits: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

name: Bloodline Perfection
benefits: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

pf2t.name: Bloodline Perfection
pf2t.body:
**Prerequisites** bloodline paragon

- - -

You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.

name: Metamagic Mastery
benefits: Altering your spells doesn't take any longer than casting them normally.

pf2t.name: Metamagic Mastery
pf2t.body: Altering your spells doesn't take any longer than casting them normally. You can use metamagic single actions as free actions.
